name: Rash Panic
overview: 8-bit style game where you need to trap monsters into holes. It's remake of much older game. Your only chance of survival is to kill the aliens that reside on the planet. To achieve this you must first dig holes for the aliens to fall info. Once an alien has fallen into a hole, you must then fill in the hole that you have dug so that the alien falls to the ground below. Some aliens though, may need to fall through more than one level to die. Powerups are there to help, some help you wrap around screen, extra life, takes aliens up a platform, oxygen booster, extra points and swap a life in team game play, slow down aliens, speed boosts and more.
